Module FlexTimes::ClassMethods
In: lib/flex_times.rb

Methods

date_column   datetime_column   time_column  

Public Instance methods

date_column(*columns)

Use similarly to datetime_column for DATE SQL types.

datetime_column(*columns)

Allows your column/field to parse date parameters created by the FlexTimes helpers into real dates upon assignment. Takes a list of columns for which you want this parsing to occur. Usage: 

  datetime_column :start_date, :end_date, :expire_time
time_column(*columns)

Use similarly to datetime_column for TIME SQL types.

[Validate]
